application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 5 x Lime (applicant's ref. T8, T10, T12, T16 and T17) - Reduce height and spread by 25% as specified, (deadwood), Remove epicormic growth up to 6M. Standing in Group G10 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Lime (applicant's ref. T9) - Lift to 4-5M over driveway/remove epicormic growth to 5M height, (deadwood). Standing in Group G10 of Tree Preservation Order; (1 x London Plane (applicant's ref. T26) - Remove deadwood only. Standing in Group G7 of Tree Preservation Order);Holly (adjacent to London Plane applicant's ref. T26) - Prune back from main union of London Plane at 3M to allow inspection of main union of London Plane. Standing in Group G7 of Tree Preservation Order; 1 x Cedar (applicant's ref. T27) - Selectively reduce laterals to east over building by up to 2.5M, Tidy storm damage, (deadwood). T3 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Lime (applicant's ref. T51) - Reduce height and spread by 25% as specified, (deadwood), Thin by 10%. Standing in Group G7 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Conifer (applicant's ref. T56) - Reduce eastern leader by 3M in height, (deadwood). Standing in Group G4 of Tree Preservation Order; (1 x Chestnut (applicant's ref. T64) - Remove deadwood only. Standing in Group G7 of Tree Preservation Order);1 x Bay (applicant's ref. T69) - Remove (deadwood) and storm damage. Standing in Group G7 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Cedar (applicant's ref. T89) - Prune lower - mid north west crown over building at 6-10M by branch lengths of up to 3M, Prune mid southern crown over building at 8-12M by branch lengths of up to 2.5M, Draw in any remaining over-extended lateral spread by up to 2.5M branch lengths selectively as required to balance, (deadwood). Standing in Group G7 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Western Red Cedar (applicant's ref. T102) - Remove low branch overhanging footpath. Standing in Group G3 of Tree Preservation Order
